original_title: 相沢みなみと過ごすヤリまくり温泉旅行ドキュメント！ ハメ撮り！すっぴん！ほろ酔い！エロ曝け出すハメ撮りSEX！
overview: Minami goes on a hot spring trip with a man he has a crush IRL. Despite he being already married and with family, they have a sincere sexual exchange.
title: A Hot Spring Resort Vacation Documentary, Filled With Nothing But Fucking With Minami Aizawa! POV! No Makeup! Party Time! Eroticism-Baring POV Sex!
